means: 祖鲁人（非洲东南部班图族的一支）

sentence.Network_en: Alpha-Bravo-Zulu 643 to Saltezar, do you read me? Over.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿尔法－布拉沃－祖鲁643呼叫萨德扎，能听到我的声音吗？完毕。

sentence.Network_en: To this day young Zulu boys practise fighting.
sentence.Network_cn: 直到现在年轻的祖鲁男孩还练习格斗。

sentence.Network_en: This Zulu Proverb can be applied to leadership in Africa today.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天,祖鲁族人这句谚语可以应用到非洲的领导身上.

entry.tran: 祖鲁人（南非一黑人种族）
entry.def: A Zulu is a member of a race of black people who live in Southern Africa.
Zulu is the language spoken by Zulus and also by many other black South Africans.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the tall Negroid people of southeast Africa living in northern Natal
2. a Bantu language of considerable literary importance in southeastern Africa

auth_sentence.content: Michael Zulu is one of the farmers in Mokwena's cooperative.

auth_sentence.content: Shaka Zulu founds and expands the Zulu empire, creates a formidable fighting force.
